name: Azeri: Journey's End
summary:
Take control of the legendary shapeshifting fox Azeri, as it goes on its final journey to breathe life back into a dying world.

Control 3 unique animals
Each animal has its own ability
Set in beautiful desolation, with remenants of the old world being taken over by nature

This project was built for the Unreal Spring Jam 2020.
